subtitle: This recipe may be made using frozen fish fillets, thawed.

method.text: Place fillets in ovenproof dish and pour over the milk. Season to taste.
Cover and poach for 15-20 min or until fish flakes easily when tested with fork. Transfer fish fillets to warmed serving dish and keep hot. Reserve milk.

Meanwhile, melt butter in pan. Fry mushrooms until softened. Stir in flour and paprika, then gradually pour in milk. Bring to boil, stirring, and simmer until thickened. Season to taste. Pour sauce over fish and serve hot.

title: Hungarian plaice
